name: Scotch & Ginger

ingredients.name: spicy ginger beer such as Blenheim’s Ginger Ale

preparation:
The Scotch & Ginger is better experienced than explained. The unforgettable blend of sweetness and spice defies description.

Add all ingredients except ginger beer to mixing glass filled with ice.

Stir until well chilled.

Strain into an ice-filled highball glass and top with spicy ginger beer.
